sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/ 2011/L.16), the SBSTA: - takes note of submissions on the elements for the development of a work programme on response measures with a view to adopting modalities for its operationalization and on a possible forum; - invites submissions from parties and relevant organizations to submit their views on the item by 19 September 2011; - requests the Secretariat to prepare a report on the special event, made available to SB 35; and - agrees to continue the forum at SB 35.
